name: Tide of Dragons - Magic Tower Defense
name_original: Tide of Dragons - Magic Tower Defense
description:
Get ready for an intense adventure as you defend your Tower against an endless horde of skeletons, zombies, dragons and more, using a wide variety of powerful elemental spells!

You'll feel the power as you use touch controls to cast spells, the roar of destruction all around you as you destroy your enemies!

Upgrade your spells to make them even more powerful, and use spell combinations to take down ever stronger enemies!

Feel the power at your complete control with Tide of Dragons!

Tide of Dragons highlights:

- Epic defensive war that will keep you hooked for hours and hours!

- High definition, intense graphics!

- Fight huge hordes of enemies!

- Game Center Achievements and Leaderboard!

- Use highly detailed and varied spells to destroy your enemies!

- Ten levels of upgrades for every spell, start from being merely powerful to being the ultimate master of reality!
